column1: Smoque BBQ////This might be the unicorn of reviews for this establishment but it's honest. I saw Smoque featured on the Food Network and told my family we had to try it. There was 10 of us
column2: and we had a big table. The staff was really attentive. The food was just okay. I was not impressed with the barbecue. The ribs were okay. The seasoning was bland. Mediocre at best. Honestly just drive to Kansas City
column3: Tennessee or other barbecue capitals to get the real stuff. Chicago should just stick to the pizza
column5: and leave the barbecue to the pros.
